messages.subject: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
messages.body:
Wednesday, September 7, 2011 11:39 AM 

MANILA CONSULTANT GROUP INC
LOAN TERMS AND CONDITIONS

Dear Arnold


I wish to notify you all your information has been received by this office. In order to seal up the transaction, our terms of service which are widely stated below must be agreed upon before any further step can be taken in this loan contract. This Company will and shall only proceed in given the requested amount once you have accepted the terms and conditions and only then also we can then ask for the borrower documents. 


TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF SERVICE 


(a) For security reasons, This Company has an Insurance registration cover incase of future loss/death occurrence by both parties. So the loan will be insured/registered under the stipulated law.


(b) The stated sum of money due for loaning must be paid back within a minimum period of the borrower duration. 


(c) The Loan attracts an interest rate of (3%). 


(d) In the course of the loan term duration, a constant monthly payment will be paid for a period of the stipulated time from the borrower, payment on interest rate first after the loan have been confirmed available to the beneficiary designated account. 


(e) Late payment of monthly installments has a penalty of 1% increase. 


(f) Borrowers/Beneficiary's are solely responsible for the upfront fee which serves as:

COLLATERAL PROCESS
 It usually requires an equity based property as collateral for our loan acquisition. We do not accept any other property type or kind due to the fact that some of our customers have missed used this opportunity. They some times claim to have properties and send us copies of ownership, and when they are not able to pay back the loan and we want to claim these properties we then find out that the properties they claim to be their own they are not the right full owners . 
NON COLLATERAL PROCESS

One thing about the alternative option is that it is a Non-collateral/security obtained from banks here which is popularly known as bank securities. When you obtain this non- collateral/security, it actually yields value which will eventually be equivalent to the loan you are obtaining during the stipulated duration of the loan. When you are unable to pay back the issuing Bank take the non-collateral which has yielded value as substitute for the loan. We will issue out your loan to the transferring bank immediately the non collateral for the loan is acquired from the bank. 


So this is why we personally will always advice that our customers should simply go for the non collateral alternative when they do not have equity based property to present as collateral.


The Non-collateral/security popularly known as bank securities, The non collateral fee will be paid and it cannot be added or removed from the principal loan amount. As soon as we are through with the process of the collateral the loan will be transferred to you from UNITED KINGDOM to your Bank. 


(g)Confidentiality: We will treat all your personal information as private and confidential (even when you are no longer a customer). Nothing about your accounts nor your name and address will be disclosed to anyone. 


(h) Protecting Our Customers: We always try to protect you from entering into any agreement that may not be in your best interest.  


If the above information is not understandable or satisfactory to you, do write back for more detailed information as your satisfaction is our delight.


Finally, if the terms of service cannot be meant by you, you can send us a Letter of Disclaimer stating that you do not wish to continue the transaction. 


Thanks for Your Co-operation 
Mrs M. Beverly 
Director of Information and Public Media Relations 
Tel: 44-703-596-0962 
Sms:44-794-755-8179

messages.subject: Treat Urgently
messages.body:
Friday, September 9, 2011 9:50 AM

 
Dear Mr Arnold.
We have seen what you sent to us,but i should let you know that you will have to send us the bank details where the money will be sent to. 
And you will have to pay the charges of $345USD for the following: 
1. Lawyer agreement 
2.Transfer charges 
3.Insurance fee 
And if you have the charges ready,then i can start the transaction and give you the agreement form and 
payment information for you to proceed with the payment. 
Regards 
Dr Gary Hill

Ima guessin too the "Dr. Mrs. Gary B. Hill" had to take a break, tis hard work y'all do, right? (I miss her) 


Oh, btw, y'all  remember ny bruthr daryl, he dun says he'll pay back any $345 I hafta borry from y'all, too... So we're good on it... EVEN IF you had to do something WEIRD like snd us the $ via Wstrn Unin er somethin' ya know, like them scammers do.... Y'all ain't no scammers, are ye?



Thanks 
Arnold

messages.subject: For your Concern
messages.body:

messages.body:
Monday, September 19, 2011 12:52 PM 


Wo wate, u saed now $400, before it wuz $345 (wut u tryn da cheet me?), Ima hafta go return some botls 4 depozit or go to Smitys oar in Chaplin da git sum more muney. Afre last time, I dont tink thayll be happy, cos I dun beat jes bout everone thar in lef-handed poker game, 'Ceptin ol Margeurite behind the bar, she's a hot one, wanna dance wif her sometime to the social....


Is gon b difikult, gotta use Momma's car, take daryl fer bakup.... AND I caint go to the WU here in town, cuz a wut my cuzn Marcelle dun ran inta the store lasset time - it wuz a mayess.... (I kin show pichers iffen y'all like me too)


The Reverund aint gon b 2 dun happy bout the exter $ either, when I haffa tell him how I maht be havin ta earn it..... I hope Mumma's car will be ok. Kin y'all send me some money fer an oil change first? Thatll sher make it ezzier to do this Westrn Onion thang.We sher r still needin the loan.


Ima shore surry y'allns dont take the "Cheque", my Bank dun told me it wuz reel offishee-al & all.... Durn them! 


Agin, why 400 now not 345? 
Thanks fer readin'. 


Your Brother in Christ, 
Arnold

messages.body:
Sunday, September 25, 2011 4:54 PM 


ok daryl n I iz reddy git this here $. 
so we got out to the Wstrn Onion Stor 2day. 


But, we gets haffwy there (by The Thrify Possum Liqour Stor, doncha know), an He sais, "hey man" - cos hes drivin -" iffen u dont get me Some o that that Jim Bean wisky, Ima leaf u here n tha Ditch!!" So ah tells him, "it Sunday, they klosed!"


Well, ol daryl, he aint as DUMB as I look, so.... He say, well BUDDY, YOU r gunna take me to the creek house.... Well we all know what that mean, he hasta git sum moonsheen, bootleg.... Prey fer our branes that they dont git damaged affer this..... 

 So wut wuz I 2 do? I HAD to git my driver sum hooch, n ord to kompleat hour taxskes. Itz 'spensiv stuff, Jim Bean. took me all $50.00, so all ah cud py WU wuz $250,00 - Hope that's ok.... 
 Well, y'all take 250,000 out of the $1M ur givin me, and KEEP that fer yourself, jus tween u & me (ah wont tell NOBODY - OK?) 

So we did that thang, n finly got to the store, n sended the $ all fine.. got the attachd offishiul reseet right cheer.... 
N heres me bank info, les get the $ quick now!!  : 


BANK-INFO: 
Name: Arnold Wanker  
Account Number: 1003448320  
Bank Name: King Southern Bank  
Country/ Destination: USA  
Bank location: 5916 Lawrenceburg Road, Chaplin, KY 40012  
Routing Number: 083907052
messages.raw:
Arnold Wanker
